/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the typical urban landscape of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a touch of serenity to the bustling cityscape below.
